DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective analysis patient present multiple rib fracture emergency room Penn State Hershey Medical Center 2010-2012 . Patient demographic , cause fracture , outcomes , chronic medical condition , vital sign , length stay , pain level treatment , sequela record analyze .
DOC.brief_title: Analysis Status , Treatment Outcomes Rib Fractures
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective chart review follow-up phone call . The initial part study retrospective chart review . For chart review study , follow data element enter participant . The investigator perform retrospective study patient treat rib fracture Penn State Hershey Medical Center ( PSHMC ) . The time period review 1/10/10 - 1/10/12 1500 case review . Data collect : - Patient Medical Record Number ( MRN ) - Name - Phone number - length stay ( admit discharge date ) - Number rib fracture per patient - Cause rib fracture - Characteristics fracture ( unilateral versus bilateral multiple versus single ) - Pain management use rib fracture include pain intervention , medication pain score - Complications attributable rib fracture , include : 1 . Shortness Breath ( SOB ) 2 . Hemothorax , 3 . Pneumothorax 4 . Flail chest 5 . Intubation require 6 . Mechanical ventilation require 7 . Opioids require pain 8 . Chest tube placement require - Sequelae rib fracture , include : 1 . Acute Respiratory Deficiency Syndrome ( ARDS ) 2 . Pneumonia 3 . Death 4. chronic pain 5. delayed subclavian vessel thrombosis 6. aortic aneurysm 7. tracheobronchial fistula 8. thoracic outlet syndrome 9 . Horner 's syndrome - Clinical history 1 . Rib fracture 2 . Other fracture 3 . Osteoporosis 4 . Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) 5 . Cancer 6 . Myocardial Infarction ( MI ) / Coronary Artery Disease ( CAD ) 7 . Arthritis 8 . Parkinson 's disease - Patient characteristic : 1 . Age 2 . Gender 3 . Race 4 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 5 . Alcohol use 6 . Smoking status 7 . Marital status 8 . Education 9 . Initial blood pressure 7.2.2 Follow-up phone call The investigator attempt call patient follow-up information use summary explanation research phone script obtain following information : 1. pain score 2. quality life via EuroQol 's quality life survey : EQ-5D-3L questionnaire 3. pain med
